packageRules._description: Ignore pin and digest upgrades. We only want published releases of the SDK to trigger upgrades

yamlConfig:
# Configuration for package matching and source URL prefixes
 matchPackageNames:
    - "go.opentelemetry.io/otel/**"  # Matches all packages under the OpenTelemetry Go library
  # List of source URL prefixes that correspond to the matched packages.
  sourceUrlPrefixes:
    - "https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-go"  # Base URL for the OpenTelemetry Go repository
  # Flag to enable or disable this configuration.
  enabled: false  # Currently set to false, meaning this configuration is not active
